education.cardSubtitle: University of London Goldsmiths - Sim Global Education, Singapore
education.cardDetailedText:
Specialization: Web and Mobile Development
 Coursework: 
 Algorithms and Data Structures, Database Management; Software Engineering; Mathematics (Discrete, Computational), Security, Blockchain Technology; UI & UX Design, Networking, Operating Systems, Object-Oriented Programming (OOP), Software Design, Cloud Services and Deployment, Data Analysis, Graphics Programming, Machine Learning, API development and integration, Game Development
